Package trigram.wordfilter

Class CompondWordFilter

java.lang.Object
trigram.wordfilter.CompondWordFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
WordFilter
public class CompondWordFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements WordFilter
Compond multiple word filters into a single WordFilter. A word will be accepted when any of the sub-filter accepts it.

    • accept

      public boolean accept​(java.lang.String word)
      Description copied from interface: WordFilter
      Detect if a word can be accepted.
      Specified by:
      accept in interface WordFilter
      Parameters:
      word - word to be filtered for use.
      Returns:
